description: Designed and implemented a scalable frontend architecture using Angular and TypeScript, with a strong focus on modularity, long-term maintainability, and future feature expansion.
Built and maintained a reusable component library aligned with design system principles, ensuring consistent UI behavior and significantly accelerating feature development.
Translated complex product requirements and Figma designs into responsive, accessible interfaces with pixel-perfect precision.
Integrated frontend applications with REST and GraphQL APIs, optimizing data flows and ensuring smooth, real-time user interactions.
Introduced linting rules, coding standards, and structured peer code reviews, improving code quality and streamlining onboarding for new team members.
Worked closely with designers, backend engineers, and product stakeholders to rapidly prototype, iterate, and deliver high-quality features in a fast-paced environment.
